name: DangerousAnimalTrivia
0:
”Alexa Start Dangerous Animal Trivia”
”start new game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dangerous animal trivia
des:
A trivia game to test your knowledge about Dangerous Animal.. Start the game by saying "Alexa Start Dangerous Animal Trivia". The trivia will give you multiple choice answers. Reply with the number of the correct answer. E.g.

Alexa: "The Platypus is one the rare species of Mammal that lay eggs, Which part of his body is venomous? 1 : its tail, 2: its legs, 3: its saliva, 4: its Claws"
User: "two"
Alexa: "Correct. Only male Platypus have a venomous spur on their back legs. It\'s mainly used during mating season to fight rivals. Your score is 2"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
